https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/47p7TSZAZK9Rc0FKwAcERPrNxvJ.jpg A fertilizer used in a rich gated community becomes the source of a genetic mutation that transforms its residents into zombies. Can a teenager and his baby sister break free from the quarantined island before turning into grass? Brain Freeze
